Layer.SetCommand: %function(self) local coursemode = GAMESTATE:IsCourseMode() local native = PREFSMAN:GetPreference('ShowNativeLanguage') if coursemode then local a = GAMESTATE:GetCurrentCourse() if native then self:settext(a:GetDisplayFullTitle()) else self:settext(a:GetTranslitFullTitle()) end else local a = GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSong() if native then self:settext(a:GetDisplayMainTitle()) else self:settext(a:GetTranslitMainTitle()) end end -- for safety you know in case self:hidden(0) end

%function(self) local a = GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSong() if PREFSMAN:GetPreference('ShowNativeLanguage') then self:settext(a:GetDisplayArtist()) else self:settext(a:GetTranslitArtist()) end self:hidden(0) end
